long_description: The ENO Double Deluxe hammock is 20 in. wider than the popular DoubleNest hammock, providing ample space for 2 or more people to kick back and relax. High-strength, breathable woven nylon and triple interlocking stitching hold up to use and abuse. Packing up to 4.5 x 6 in., backpackers, world travelers and beach-goers are sure to appreciate the travel-friendly versatility. Marine-grade line with metal snap links securely attach to trees, posts, boat masts and whatever else you can find. Maximum capacity of 400 lbs. ENO Double Deluxe hammock includes a built-in stuff sack. Please note: ENO uses all fabric remnants in the production of their hammocks so the color combination of the hammock you receive may vary slightly from the picture.
